features.description: SecurDoor combines cutting-edge technology with user-friendly features to provide comprehensive access control.

1.description: Multi-layered encryption and security measures that exceed industry standards to keep your premises secure.
1.title: Advanced Security Protocols

2.description: Manage access seamlessly from anywhere with our web dashboard for both administrators and users.
2.title: Remote Access Control

3.description: Set specific access windows for visitors, contractors, and employees based on schedules and requirements.
3.title: Time-based Permissions

4.description: Customize access levels for different user roles, ensuring the right people have the right level of access.
4.title: Role-based Access Management

5.description: Monitor access events in real-time with instant notifications for suspicious activities.
5.title: Real-time Monitoring

6.description: Create custom alert rules for specific events, time periods, or access points.
6.title: Customizable Alerts

7.description: Automatically track and generate logs for access events.
7.title: Logs

8.description: Seamlessly integrate with your existing CCTV systems for synchronized security monitoring.
8.title: Integrated Video Surveillance

9.description: Implement immediate lockdown/evacuation procedures across all access points with a single command.
9.title: Emergency Lockdown/Evacuation

features.title: Intelligent Features for Complete Control

footer.description: Intelligent access control solutions for modern enterprises. Securing your premises with advanced technology.

hero.description: SecurDoor transforms how you protect your premises with advanced access management that evolves with your security needs.
hero.title: Intelligent Access Control for the Modern Era

pricing.description: Choose the plan that matches your organization's security needs and budget.

enterprise.name: Enterprise

standard.description: Perfect for personal use, small businesses and single locations

pricing.title: Security Solutions for Every Scale

testimonials.description: Discover how SecurDoor has transformed access control for organizations worldwide.
testimonials.disclaimer: DISCLAIMER: The testimonials are fictitious and do not represent the actual opinions or experiences of the individuals and companies mentioned.

1.author: Ivan Petrov
1.quote: SecurDoor completely changed the security of our building. Biometric authentication and real-time monitoring give us peace of mind like never before.

2.author: Mariya Georgieva
2.quote: We implemented SecurDoor in our organization and saw immediate improvements in staff access management and visitor tracking. The emergency protocols are particularly impressive.

3.author: Dimitar Stoyanov
3.quote: The ability to remotely control access and receive instant notifications has completely changed our approach to security. SecurDoor is a must-have tool for any modern access control system.

4.author: Elena Vasileva
4.quote: Advanced encryption and multi-layered security features ensure that our premises are always safe. SecurDoor is the best investment in security we've ever made.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Security Professionals
